p: As a bioisostere of pyrimidine, a nucleoside component of nucleic acids, the thiadiazole ring can impart antiviral activity [ 28]. Studies concerning the antiviral activity of 1,3,4-thiadiazole derivatives often gave compounds with moderate or lower in vitro anti-HIV-1 and anti-HIV-2 activity than the reference drugs [ 63, 64]. A relevant example is the chiral 2-substituted 5-(4-chlorophenylamino)-1,3,4-thiadiazoles 1â€“ 5 synthesized by Akhtar et al. by acidic cyclodehydration of the corresponding thiosemicarbazides [ 65].
